---
title: "rbiom and BioConductor"
---


<br>

## Convert from rbiom to (Tree)SummarizedExperiment

```r
# An rbiom object
biom <- rbiom::hmp50

# A SummarizedExperiment object
se <- rbiom::convert_to_SE(biom)

# A TreeSummarizedExperiment object
tse <- rbiom::convert_to_TSE(biom)
```


<br>

## Convert from (Tree)SummarizedExperiment to rbiom

```r
# `se` is a SummarizedExperiment object
# `tse` is a TreeSummarizedExperiment object

# Convert to rbiom objects
biom1 <- rbiom::as_rbiom(se)
biom2 <- rbiom::as_rbiom(tse)
```
